ComicInfo.Summary: Sworn to Protect: X-Factor joins the X-Men in battling Hulk to try and keep him from taking Xavier. Unfortunately, even a fully powered Juggernaut cannot put a stop to the angry jade giant. Finally, it is a passionate argument from Mercury, one of Xavier's young students, that gets the Hulk to relent and leave the X-Men alone.
